product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Field Saw 5.5 - 2013 Overstock
long_description: An essential tool for backcountry and camping excursions, the compact Ultimate Survival Technologies 5.5 in. Field Saw smoothly cuts through branches and brush but takes up little space in your pack. 5.5-inch 440 Stainless serrated steel blade is rust-resistant; blade folds closed into handle for added security. Polypropylene/TPR handle is durable and allows a secure, comfortable grip. Ultimate Survival Technologies 5.5 in. Field Saw includes a nylon carry sheath and wrist lanyard. Overstock.
short_description: An essential tool for backcountry and camping excursions, the compact Ultimate Survival Technologies 5.5 in. Field Saw smoothly cuts through branches and brush but takes up little space in your pack.
